alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Graves; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 6:58PM EDT until May 15 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR CARLISLE...SOUTHWESTERN MCCRACKEN...SOUTHEASTERN BALLARD AND NORTHWESTERN GRAVES COUNTIES... At 557 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lovelaceville, or near La Center, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Carlisle, southwestern McCracken, southeastern Ballard and northwestern Graves Counties, including the following locations... Arlington, Blandville and Kevil. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
